Up.Statement: UPDATE w2_TargetList SET data_count = datacount.count FROM w2_TargetList INNER JOIN ( SELECT dept_id, master_id, COUNT(user_id) AS count FROM w2_TargetListData WHERE target_kbn = 'TargetList' GROUP BY dept_id, master_id ) datacount ON (datacount.dept_id = w2_TargetList.dept_id AND datacount.master_id = w2_TargetList.target_id)
